wikipedia_page.main: Claire McCollum (born 5 June 1974, Carrickfergus) is a Northern Irish broadcaster and journalist.

response: The current main presenters are Aled Jones, Katherine Jenkins, Sean Fletcher, Kate Bottley, Brenda Edwards, Claire McCollum, JB Gill, Katie Piper, Laura Wright, Pam Rhodes, Gemma Hunt, James Lusted, YolanDa Brown, and Radzi Chinyanganya., BBC Songs of Praise website. Retrieved 17 January 2021.
